    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:05.440

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = It's wake up America, Patriot blend.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:09.879
    | text      = What about you, man?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:10.879
    | text      = That's what I want to know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:11.879
    | text      = Aren't you tired of feeling unwanted?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:12.879
    | text      = Aren't you tired of feeling like an outcast and being stepped upon?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:13.879
    | text      = Well then today is your day!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:14.879
    | text      = Because today is the day that Bray Wyatt decided he was going to die.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:15.879
    | text      = I'm tired of feeling like an outcast and being stepped upon, but then today is your day!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:30.159
    | text      = I don't like to hype things, but people are designed to hype.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:34.320
    | text      = You do as you're told, so says the man.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:42.240
    | text      = You see what they want you to see, and you feel whatever it is they want you to feel,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:48.240
    | text      = but I am different.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:54.759
    | text      = Where you see a blank canvas, I see a beautiful painting.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:09:59.120
    | text      = And when you hear silence, I hear symphony.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:03.240
    | text      = I have a thousand faces and a million names, seducer, accuser, destroyer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:12.759
    | text      = With my free will, I can dial to the Satan channel in two seconds.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:19.080
    | text      = I can go into that bathroom in there and look right into my eyes for about two seconds and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:24.679
    | text      = decide to let something else jump right into me in the driver's seat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:28.200
    | text      = And that something could absolutely tear people's arms out of their sockets.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:33.879
    | text      = But the eyes of a fool are blinded by pride, and now the devil is knocking on your door!
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:43.679
    | text      = Knock, knock, knock.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:51.159
    | text      = He just wants you to come home.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:10:55.399
    | text      = Just let him in, let him in, let me in.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:02.080
    | text      = Let's go to break, cause you may not need a break, but I gotta go pee-pee.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:06.519
    | text      = But if you need me, I ain't hard to find.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:09.840
    | text      = All you gotta do is go look up in the sky and follow the buzzer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:15.679
    | text      = Thank you Harry, you're now a technocrat.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:19.519
    | text      = So yeah, the theme of these other clips are Bray Wyatt clips, for those folks who may
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:26.559
    | text      = not know wrestling much, or maybe only know it from our rambling about it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:34.279
    | text      = This week, Bray Wyatt passed away.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:37.600
    | text      = My favorite wrestler died at 36, just absolutely tragic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:46.320
    | text      = It's really tough to deal with celebrity deaths, because I don't know these people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:53.039
    | text      = I don't know any of these people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:54.919
    | text      = And when a celebrity dies, people talk about like, I met this person at X, Y, or Z thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:03.879
    | text      = Eulogizing of public figures is tough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.639
    | text      = But this hits hard for me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:09.559
    | text      = I loved Bray Wyatt, the character.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:12.960
    | text      = I thought there was an artistry to it that was so far beyond other things that I see
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.639
    | text      = in pro wrestling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:20.639
    | text      = Now granted, this isn't to knock other types of pro wrestling.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:25.759
    | text      = It's just something that's very different.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:27.919
    | text      = There's an immersiveness to it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:29.399
    | text      = There's a mythology.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:30.519
    | text      = There's this guy who is creating a world that is supposed to live within this other world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:39.440
    | text      = It's nonsensical on some levels.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:42.360
    | text      = But he had such an amazing gift to be able to draw you into it with this speaking, this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:49.320
    | text      = skill of just weaving a tapestry of words that make it feel like it's not silly somehow.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.279
    | text      = I think that I was pretty harsh and very notoriously worried about Uncle Howdy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:12.320
    | text      = You were concerned?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:13.320
    | text      = The most recent incarnation of what Bray Wyatt was doing, the last time he came back from
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.240
    | text      = sort of a repackaging of the gimmick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:23.679
    | text      = Because I thought, well this is worrisome.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:26.080
    | text      = There's another silly mask involved and I don't quite know what the point is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:31.399
    | text      = And then it turned into that glow in the dark match that was very weird.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:36.360
    | text      = I was very concerned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:38.320
    | text      = But I was willing to see how it played out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:40.840
    | text      = And that's the kind of faith that I had in this person, this artist, this craft.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:49.879
    | text      = I feel like I felt so comfortable in that worry because I had a sense and a feeling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.419
    | text      = that has obviously now shown to be wrong, that for the rest of my life, essentially,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:03.440
    | text      = I would see other things he created.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:07.120
    | text      = Maybe this Uncle Howdy thing, maybe this is a zero.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:10.919
    | text      = Maybe this doesn't work out, but the next thing he tries, I'm sure there will be something
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:16.440
    | text      = to it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:17.440
    | text      = Or there will at least be like, I see what is trying to be done here, but meh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:23.960
    | text      = And now that is not the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:26.039
    | text      = That is something that we'll never have again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:27.879
    | text      = We'll never have the next thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:29.799
    | text      = You had the hillbilly cult leader guy Bray Wyatt character, the Eater of Worlds.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:36.120
    | text      = And then you had the Fiend and the Firefly Funhouse and you had this feeling that that'll
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:42.200
    | text      = be there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:43.200
    | text      = The next thing will be there and I'll see if I love that too.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:46.879
    | text      = And then now there shall be no more Uncles Howdy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:50.919
    | text      = And there would be the comeback of one of the characters that he left behind.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:56.000
    | text      = That's also part of the thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:57.200
    | text      = There would have been a career.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:59.799
    | text      = He established himself as having a career that was going to be there, that he fought
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:04.519
    | text      = for and earned.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:05.840
    | text      = Yeah, and I don't know, it's hard.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.240
    | text      = It's brutal.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:11.480
    | text      = I never got to see him live.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:13.000
    | text      = I never went to a WWE event that he was at.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:16.639
    | text      = And I don't know, something that moved me a little bit was thinking about, and this
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:22.759
    | text      = sounds so dorky or whatever, but I never got to be one of the fireflies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:29.240
    | text      = Whenever he came out to the ring, he would be carrying a lantern.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:32.360
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:33.360
    | text      = Well, it's our Twitter, we're here, pinned tweet thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:37.120
    | text      = Yeah, blowing out the lantern is the menacing thing that he would do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:42.279
    | text      = And everyone would put up their cell phone lights in the darkness and they were the fireflies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:49.320
    | text      = I always thought eventually I'll be able to take part in this fun pageantry, and no, I
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:55.600
    | text      = never will get to do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:57.799
    | text      = These opportunities lost, and it does make you think of, well, time not promised.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.120
    | text      = I know a lot of people die, and I know this isn't enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:09.240
    | text      = Almost everybody dies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:11.279
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:12.279
    | text      = But in the realm of creators that you like and artists and stuff, it is, time is not
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:19.139
    | text      = promised.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:20.139
    | text      = You think Aerosmith is going on a farewell tour, YouTube ads have told me about this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:26.200
    | text      = And it's like you think about it, and you're like, well, yeah, I should probably see them
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:29.320
    | text      = before it's never an option again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:33.039
    | text      = With this, with someone like Bray, I had that thought of eventually I'll be able to see
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.080
    | text      = this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:40.080
    | text      = And you never think a farewell tour was that glow in the dark match.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:43.279
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:44.279
    | text      = No, you don't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:45.279
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:46.279
